name: Dr. Lily Green
bio: Dr. Green specializes in plant pathology and sustainable gardening practices. Her research helps optimize plant health in diverse environments.

name: Mark Sprout
bio: Mark focuses on creating beautiful and functional green spaces for city dwellers, using drought-tolerant and native species to promote eco-friendly design.

name: Sara Bloom
bio: Sara is passionate about chemical-free cultivation and soil enrichment. She helps home gardeners grow nutritious, organic produce with sustainable techniques.

name: David Root
bio: David is a certified arborist offering expert guidance on tree health, pruning, and disease prevention for both urban and rural landscapes.
